title: Waterproof Kitchen Mat Shelf Liner 45?150 ? Easy To Clean, Oil Proof, Anti Slip Multipurpose Drawer And Shelf Cover (Random Color)
description:
Description
Waterproof Kitchen Mat Shelf Liner 45?150 ? Easy To Clean, Oil Proof, Anti Slip Multipurpose Drawer And Shelf Cover (Random Color)

This 45?150 Shelf Liner Is A Practical And Stylish Solution For Protecting Kitchen Shelves, Drawers, And Cabinets. Designed With A Waterproof And Oil Proof Surface, It Prevents Stains, Spills, And Dirt From Damaging Surfaces While Keeping Them Clean And Hygienic. The Non Slip Texture Ensures Items Stay In Place, While The Material Is Easy To Cut And Adjust According To Your Desired Size. With Bright And Attractive Prints, It Adds A Decorative Touch Along With Functionality. Easy To Wash And Reusable, This Liner Is Perfect For Daily Use In Kitchen, Refrigerator, Cupboards, And Other Storage Spaces.

Key Features:

Size 45?150 Premium Quality Shelf Liner In Random ColorWaterproof And Oil Proof For Long Lasting ProtectionEasy To Clean, Washable, And ReusableAnti Slip Texture To Hold Items FirmlyCan Be Cut And Adjusted To Desired SizeIdeal For Kitchen, Drawers, Cabinets, And RefrigeratorStylish Design Adds Decorative Touch
